ygData.msgSnippet: (Sorry about that Jason, but you have to admit it was pretty convenient. And I m sorry I m only averaging one post a night. It s because of school and my dad

(Sorry about that Jason, but you have to admit it was pretty convenient. And 
I'm sorry I'm only averaging one post a night. It's because of school and my 
dad working out of home and he hogs the comp. But he goes back to the office 
on Monday probably so I should get the computer at nights.)


Vulois

Vulois heard Windrazor's comment.

"There's a good chance we took a wrong turn, but I'm pretty sure we went the 
right way. I remember these nooks. But if we took the wrong way, we're 
doomed."

Vulois left that thought to sink in.
______________________________________________________________________
Fliq/Brix

"Cybertron?"Fliq said," I...I don't really know It's been years since I saw 
it. Let me just tell you it's nothing like earth. No water, no plants 
no...no life! All metalic creatures, who either have no transformations or 
like jets and other equipment. There's very tall buildings and and busy 
streets. I remember....there was this one building, I think it was a weapon 
manufacturer. My friends and I would sneak in, being the kids we were, and 
looking at the weapons. We were eventually caught, and beaten by our 
parents. But it was worth it. I'll tell ya...it's like no place any where 
else in the world. And I don't know if I'll ever see it again, because it 
doesn't have an orbit. It drifts wildly through space. It's probably 
millions of miles from where I last saw it. Ah, but Earth is like no place 
in the universe either, with it's lushes life. And this is where we are 
needed. I know that some people don't believe in destiny, but I think 
everything I've done was to prepare me for this war. This wasn't the plan. 
All 10 of us would come, and with the extra power we would easily defeat the 
Preds. But it wasn't to be."

Fliq sat quiet thinking about how he got to this point in his life, until 
Brix came in.

"Hey guys! I found the tools, so let's get working. Oh, and their was this 
weird sound following me everywhere, but it's gone now."

Brix distributed the tools and started removing the hull."
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream watched Testifyer just walk off and give him a dirty look. Almost 
as soon as he got outside a fight broke out. Starscream fixed a problem with 
the structure and than went outside and saw Testifyer.

"You...you hurt KitKat, and than walk away from me? NO ONE WALKS AWAY FROM 
ME! And stop attacking this cave. I am Starscream of the Predacons, and this 
is our castle. As it will soon be OUR WORLD! JET MODE!"

Starscream went to Jet Mode and and charged Testifyer head on with lasers 
firing 10 shots.
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

Gotron follows the Alliance Army headed for the fight.

"Good! Finaly a chance to show off my skills in combat!"
______________________________________________________________________
Zava

Zava decided this would be a good time to get on the good side of Deemos.

"That bot, over there(Terrorsaur) would make a perfect target!"

Zava turned on her jet pack and flew towards Terrorsaur, firing four shots 
of her plasma cannons.
